synopsis.text: The second season of Assassination Classroom presents a series of short stories, derived straight from the manga, that didn't make it into the TV series. These delightful vignettes, featured in the ninth volume of the manga, offer a glimpse into the daily escapades of the beloved Koro-sensei and his pupils. The adapted chapters include 'Takebayashi no Jikan' and 'Shihaisha no Jikan, Ni Jikanme', providing a fresh perspective on the characters and their unique world. These side stories promise a heartwarming and thrilling ride, making them a must-watch for any Assassination Classroom fan.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
